website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the clip-on design, the superaffordable Logitech Tablet Speaker actually sounds decent enough and offers compatibility with multiple devices thanks to its simple and flexible design.
pros: The affordable Logitech Tablet Speaker clips on to any tablet, plugs into the device's headphone jack, and offers significantly better sound than your tablet's speakers
It also has a built-in rechargeable battery, includes a protective cover, and works with any device that has a 3.5mm headphone jack, including laptops
cons: The cord is a little short, and the battery is nonreplaceable
The clip isn't the most elegant or sturdy attachment, either

customer_reviews.title: TOO QUIET
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is awesome. I love how it attaches to my ipad and charging it is very simple. Just plug it into the computer with the cord that is included and you're all set. The reason I bought it was because my ipad is not very loud and I needed the boost when I'm watching or listening to something and doing other things at the same time. ( I always watch movies on my ipad when I'm ironing -which is a very quiet activity) The reason I am giving this a low rating is because it is WAY too quiet. It is just a hair louder than my ipad. What a bummer from such a cool product!
customer_reviews.author: valentine

customer_reviews.title: WOW this really works
customer_reviews.text: My wife complained that her Ipad was just not loud enough when she wanted to watch a movie while cooking. So I decided to buy one for her. She loved it and it solved her problem. So I bought two more and gave one to my 87 yr old Mom who is almost deaf. Once she heard how well it worked on her Ipad she started to cry. Maybe it was the first time she could actually hear her Ipad. In any case this little speaker worked very well for our family. This is not some big stereo sound, but for us it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AllenB

customer_reviews.title: It's not any louder than my original tablet speaker, just a little more clarity
customer_reviews.text: I expected a LOT more from a Logitech branded product. I'm really disgusted. I've owned so many Logitech products that performed passably well over the years, that I frankly reach for the brand whenever I need a simple computer accessory. Mouse, keyboard, camera, computer speakers with subwoofer, arm rest. This is by far the worst Logitech product I have ever used. The unaided tablet sounds as loud as the tablet with the speaker attached. I cannot accept this. All you had to do was boost volume and clarity. Clarity is fair - volume is unchanged. I have requested a refund from Amazon. You're not my go-to brand any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I expected - provides far better sound than any tablet's (as least any tablet of which I'm aware) internal speaker. The Bluetooth works very well with two tablets we've tried so far. I can hear bass notes! I didn't even realize when I ordered this product that it was made by (in effect) Cyber Acoustics. I have a couple of other products from them, including a set of computer speakers that has been with me for, I believe, about 15 years. Still going strong. Assuming you get a good unit, this model is outstanding. Highly, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Logitech.  Your customer service is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness that Amazon allows returns cause this thing is definitely going back. Charged it for 5 hours and still didn't work. Charged it for an entire day and although the red light went off, the cord was too short to reach the outlet. Bought an extension so I could hang it on top of the laptop. Went off again and needs to be recharged after using it for ONE day. When I first encountered problems I called Logitech - do NOT bother them. They must be terribly BUSY. Told me someone would get back to me in 48 hours. They should have never stopped production of their Z305 because this one SUCKS.
customer_reviews.author: David Kane

customer_reviews.title: buy it anyway
customer_reviews.text: no amplification above source. has stereo separation. there are many better speaker additions for tablets and phones and netbooks on amazon (most of them start w/ Oontz). none of the others have a hardwired stereo mini-jack. few charge via mini-usb. this is not a feature rich device. it is however comma simple. it is easy to setup and easy to charge (if you have a free usb port you can leave it plugged in to audio and to charge, i did this on an asus vivotab). no pairing. true _and actual_ plug and play. it _is_ better than a built in mono speaker. works w/ anything w/ audio mini-jack port on host device.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Option for Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker to use with our 7" touch screen raspberry pi. We were looking for one that could attach to the standard screen case so the screen could be mounted to the wall. This one worked perfectly. It can be clipped to the top of the screen and is pretty secure. We have the speaker plugged in all the time to a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: CBU

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. It definitely raises the volume and bass ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. It definitely raises the volume and bass above the IPAD's built in speakers. The sound is clear and gives you a richer sound experience. My only gripe's that the rechargeable battery life isn't the greatest (e.g. only 2-3 hrs of straight play time) and the charge literally takes hours. It takes about the same amount of time to charge this speaker as an IPAD takes from 0% to 100%. That just seems too long to wait.
customer_reviews.author: Booky

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife's desktop. She didn't want speaker sitting on the desk, so this is a nice fit as it clips to the back of the top of her monitor just perfect and is out of site. We ran both the 3.5mm audio and USB cable (power) to it so we really aren't using the battery. The sound is very good given the size and location.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Simply brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little system! Could not be happier. It’s convenient, fits brilliantly in my book bag with my tablet. The sound quality is clear and full. Only issue, and not important to me at all is that if I actually attach it to my tablet, my tablet is unstable. So it just sits along the front and is just fine for my use. Extremely happy with every aspect of this little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sprite Kiger

customer_reviews.title: keep scrolling
customer_reviews.text: The pros- It is small and light. It looks very cool. its super easy to operate, just plug into the headphone jack and turn it on. The cons- the cord is to short. the battery life is way to short. and the sound amplification is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Fryem

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with product at all
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this for a Laptop, thinking the speaker would provide some sound while streaming. The cord you need to plug into the headphone jack is too short, so I had to clip the speaker onto the side. NO Volume Control !! The volume wasn't even worth plugging in the speaker. It's a speaker sitting in my junk drawer now. Not worth the money, get another brand
customer_reviews.author: Shars Web

customer_reviews.title: a dependable speaker
customer_reviews.text: great sound, greatly enhances the experience of using the tablet for watching films. long-lasting charge, full recharge overnight via usb cable when finally needed. i hadn't realized how truly tinny the sound on my amazon fire tablet was until i attached this speaker. i recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: laplane

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: When the speaker is clipped and centered on the laptop (such that to laptop camera is not blocked) the audio cable too short. An extra 3 inches would be perfect. Luck for me, I had an audio extension cable. Overall, not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan L. Ebanks

customer_reviews.title: Inferior in my experience
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea. I wasn't interested in amplifying music or anything, just a few public radio shows that aren't carried by my local station. It worked ok, not great, but ok, until the battery first ran down. It won't recharge. Used the included cord, followed instructions, and it won't recharge. Red light doesn't come on, indicating that it's charging, because it isn't and won't. So I've had the thing for three months and that's that. Obviously, I can't say that anyone who buys one will have the same experience, but that was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tablet speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent speaker for your laptop or computer. I use it to watch Netflix and the sound quality is great. Not just for the IPAD can be used with any computer or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Linton

customer_reviews.title: Only for tablets.
customer_reviews.text: Okay Speakers for the price but will distort at higher volumes. The mini plug cord is very short and is only like 10" long. The cord is to short to clip on the monitor of a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher Arc

customer_reviews.title: good sound, heavy, and silly-outdated mini-usb jack
customer_reviews.text: I don't use iPads but I got this for my Asus Transformer. So my review won't be complete but hopelly still helpful. The sound quality is not bad for the price. It does help when watching Hulu or Amazon Instant Video more enjoyable. The downside is that the unit is quite big (and adds to the weight of already heavy tablets). The worst part about this speaker is its outdated mini-usb port (as oppose to micro-usb of most portable devices) for battery charging. Don't lose the included cable or forget to take it with you on your trip.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for music apps!
customer_reviews.text: I use several music apps on my iPad. The metronome, for example, simply wasn't loud enough without an added speaker. But, above this, the quality of this speaker is excellent. When using YouTube or iTunes, I get nothing short of excellent results - crystal clear sound production. A real joy to use - easily rechargeable through any USB port. (I returned a BlueTooth speaker for $90 that wasn't even one half as loud. I guess you're paying for the BlueTooth convenience. Convenient it was not - it was difficult to turn on and a pain to get the iPad to recognize it.) A lot of thought was put into the Logitech speaker - a lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Mathias

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few things. Not a fan of blu tooth with the Ipad because of a time lag. This works well. Very, very happy with this purchase, it was EXACTLY what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Better speakers out there, this one has some usefulness though
customer_reviews.text: I was rather let down by this model. The volume is lower than I would like it to be. Hearing it over a campfire is a strain. The tube design doesn't help project audio to the listeners. The plug is set in a groove, and even out of the box, I can tell the continuity of the wire has already been compromised, so using it to store the cord would definetly break the unit. This obvious planned obsolescence kind of offends me really.. I will have a use for it though, so I give it 3 stars. A very cautious 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, EXCEPT...
customer_reviews.text: This worked beautifully (no volume control, but that didn't bother me) UNTIL it went dead during a recent trip when my husband and I were watching a movie, and I realized I had misplaced the recharge unit. (So many black cord thingies floating around the house. And some part of me thought it was battery-charged. You should have seen us trying to find out where the batteries went!) So, now I have a nice little paperweight--until I find the recharger, or until I give up. Before that, boy, was I recommending it to people! Dream come true. Now, ughh.
customer_reviews.author: RdRydngHd

customer_reviews.title: Good, but iffy clamps
customer_reviews.text: Major fault for me was the clamps did not hold onto iPad when in portrait view. Speaker slid off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bridges

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a brand new iPad. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a brand new iPad. I didn't realize that this speaker is made to be plugged in to the ear phone socket on an iPad. New, 6th generation iPads no longer have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dryburgh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cheap to boot!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my ipad mini. I was pretty disappointed in the mini's speakers because i couldn't even bring up the sound to be heard over a little ambient noise. This little gadget packs a good punch with only a little added weight. It's not going to give you room filling sound, but for twenty bucks, you're crazy to expect that. However they are very clear and crisp and they raise the volume on a tablet to what it should be so you can set it down and still hear it across a room. No static, no distortion. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been impressed with past Logitech products. This was working perfectly for approximately two weeks. One day the green light began to oscillate on and off along with the audio. Possibly it needed a charge so I charged it for about 3 hours. Went to use it again and the same issue occurred. Very disappointed with this product. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jack k

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker
customer_reviews.text: No one will mistake the sound for a hi fidelity system, but it is certainly fuller and louder than the internal speakers in an iPad or laptop (it can clip onto an iPad but otherwise works fine for anything with an audio output to its miniplug input), and easily recharges via USB connection. It has no volume control of its own -- you regular volume from your iPad or other computer. Compact enough to carry around in, say, a brief case or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer Guy

customer_reviews.title: You absolutely NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: This product, by far, is the best accessory I've bought to go along with my iPad, especially for when I am watching movies. It makes ALL THE DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD! The sound quality is EXCELLENT and the price is affordable and the fact that it is rechargeable is oh...so...convenient! You can take away my other MANY DIFFERENT IPAD ACCESSORIES, BUT DON'T TAKE AWAY MY LOGITECH SPEAKERS!!! I have really been impressed with the quality of Logitech as well. You will be really glad you invested in this speaker for your iPad. I use mine all the time and it never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: pretty good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: my main complaint with this unit is that it is easy to leave on. They wired the on switch backwards to that you push to turn it off rather than push to turn it on. thusly i have left it on numerous times and run down the battery. The cord is pretty good as it folds nicely into moulded recesses in the body and the sound has good umph and bass for the size of the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: vwvan

customer_reviews.title: Okay Speakers. Odd Fit.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers definitely make the iPad louder which is a big plus. This was a gift for my father and he greatly appreciated the audio boost. It's designed to clip onto an iPad however the clips themselves a little hard and I personally wouldn't keep it latched onto the glass of an iPad. The overall sound quality is mediocre but at this price point I was just looking for a boost in volume and nothing more. It definitely delivers on that. Best however to plug it into the headphone jack and just leave it laying nearby.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Loud and good. Great for my ipad, boosts the sound without being too much.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Useful IF it works.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item as it failed to charge using my iPad charger. . Had it continued to work I would have kept it as it improved the quality of the sound from my iPad, even if it did not much increase the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product does not maintain consistent sound. Spotty interrupted sound. Should
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have tried this product two times now. On both occasions I attached this product to my iPad air by plugging into the ear phone port On both occasions the products seem to work for about 20 minutes at the most and then the sound would come out and interrupted spurts. I would have to say that this is not a good product to use with an iPad..
customer_reviews.author: james mckay

customer_reviews.title: So great, bought 4 more
customer_reviews.text: Bought first unit. Absolutely incredible sound for size and cost. Bought four more for family and friends. They have now purchased more on their own for other family members. Of course, sound is not concert hall quality, but for a small, rechargeable, light, convenient, inexpensive piece of hardware, this speaker system is perfect. I used to lug around a stereo system to provide musical background at workshop sessions. Now, I just use this handy speaker and it provides sufficient sound and quality to fill a large meeting room with background music. It fits in your pocket. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Soriano

customer_reviews.title: A very nice travel speaker
customer_reviews.text: While traveling and staying in hotels I often like to play music using my laptop or iPad, but the tiny, tinny buiult-in speakers aren't much. This tablet speaker works with laptops, iPads, iPhones, and most any other device with a headphone jack, and it makes a huge difference. It it true audiophile quality? Not by a longshot, but if you want something that's somewhere between tiny, tinny and real audiophile--and is light and inexpensive too--this fills the bill. Seems to last a long time on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Bluewater

customer_reviews.title: not good as clip-on for ipad.
customer_reviews.text: When clipped on, speakers are still in the back; which is the problem with ipad speakers. Without clipping on, the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: E Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker just arrived and appears exactly as described.I have used it for the last two days and am very pleased thus far.Loud enough to hear from my kitchen to my upstairs bedroom.I recently purchase I luv mo beats but the after two weeks the charger would not fit into the speaker .It was a mystery to me as I had just used the speaker the day before.This speaker was less expensive and so far sounds the same as mo beats is but less expensive .
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelin age 51

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The last two external speakers I bought were crap. This is a vastly superior design compared to anything I have tried so far. Sound quality is good and it clips nicely to my iPad mini. I got it as a plan B in case my new stereo did not connect like it should. It does, that said I am looking forward to using this.
customer_reviews.author: Hesperus

customer_reviews.title: Great product but could be louder
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Logitech in general and I was looking for an external speaker to compliment my iPad. I love the look of the speaker and the overall sound that it produces. My only complaint is that I wish is was a little louder. It definitely added booming sound to my iPad 1st gen but the speakers in my iPad 4th gen are almost as loud as the external speakers. Pros: Great look Excellent price point Charge lasts a long time Cons: Definitely needs to be louder
customer_reviews.author: StevieB

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas because he can’t hear his speaker on his iPad. It was the perfect gift! It also works with his iPhone. Watching online videos has been great! You would never need to have the volume all the way up. When I saw the price, I really didn’t expect it to be as awesome as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a must have
customer_reviews.text: I own the Logitech usb soundbar for my laptop and I wanted something similar for my iPad. This is smaller but serves the same function, big sound from a portable device. Holds a charge very well. I have a triangular iPad case and I have found that it fits better lying in the triangle formed by the case than it does clipped on top. Have already bought a second one for me wife. Can't imagine owning an iPad without one
customer_reviews.author: M. McDougall

customer_reviews.title: It was nice until the clip snapped.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice until the clip snapped. I've had it less than 18 months and it's not like I really take it anywhere - it might have moved from one room to another a dozen times, but it's never been tossed in a bag or banged around. The sound is pretty good and I like the way it works, but with a broken clip it's fairly useless.
customer_reviews.author: W. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Okay for music, not great for audio books
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little speaker hoping that I could listen to audio books while working on my house. The maximum volume is adequate for music, but the audio books with spoken voice are not even remotely loud enough to hear if you're several feet away and working. I will say that the speaker vp certainly enhances the Ipad sound. and if you want to lie in bed and listen to a book, it' sure at. Otherwise....get something else.
customer_reviews.author: S. Torregrosa

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but no auto shut-off
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and the charge lasts a long time. I know this because I forget to shut it off sometimes and it is still running the next day. But that is also my main complaint. If it had an auto shut-off it would have all 5 stars, maybe 6. I needed it because my iPad's speakers died.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The previous model from Logitech was so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping for. The previous model from Logitech was so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Such a nifty soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Way louder than my iPad's internal speakers. Clips securely. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: xThuglash

customer_reviews.title: Simple Cheap Solution
customer_reviews.text: The sound went out on my iPad which was really annoying. The headphones worked though, but I didn't like having to stay attached to my iPad. Then I saw this for a reasonable price that I could plug into the headphone jack. Now I am able to listen to Audible books on speaker again, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Miri

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good speaker for the price I guess
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is very portable and for the most part a bit louder than the built in speakers, although I would have liked it to be a little bit louder. Compared to the ipad speaker it is a dream though...you get the surround sound feel instead of the flat mono sound coming from one side of the ipad. Overall I think this little guy was worth the price and I would recommend it to anyone searching for an ipad speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nigeria N. Hammad

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker to provide better sound for my IPad. This is a great product for the money. The rechargeable battery lasted through a 2 hour movie easily. I also use it with my Mac Book Pro Laptop. I have listened to classical music through my IPad and found the sound to be rich and full. I wish the unit had a volume control, and not have to rely on the control on the IPAD or Laptop. Sometimes I wished for more volume or loudness. Great product. Shipping was great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this speaker. I bought this for my tablet so I could give my tablet speakers a break. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: I have to believe my order was a fluke, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to believe my order was a fluke, but it still upset me. The package arrived opened, and the speaker was clearly used. I did take the time to play with the speaker (encase a bought a replacement), and it didn't overly impress me. I've decided to not purchase a replacement, and the return was made.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Mittness

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: This speaker set up does make my tablet easier to hear. But the design would have been better if the speakers didn't face straight out on each end. It would have been better to have them face up in the same direction. I have to put them in a large cup to hear them better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for an awesome product. Compact yet so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: big speakers little package
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these speakers they hook right up my mp3 player, tablet or any other standard sound making thing! Though they might not have the sound of a $500.00 dollar sound system they also don't have the cost, what they do have is a suprisingly good , loud sound that's rich and full . They are very portable and recharge from a mini usb, this is one of my favorite buys this year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I actually got more sound out of my iPad without this speaker. It wasn't worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: LollyOhio

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months.. then died.
customer_reviews.text: This plugged in and sounded pretty good. Played for 2 months. Just went flat out dead.. Logitech, I counted on more..
customer_reviews.author: PA  Porchsitter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for 5yrs and used it almost every night to play lullabies for my children connected to an old iPod - and it is only just now starting to fail (loose power connection). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good enough is good enough
customer_reviews.text: I saw a fair amount of controversy about this before I bought it, but after it being in use now for a couple of weeks, I'm happy enough (although just today I saw a Best Buy ad that looked mighty appealing for the same idea). It's not high-end, or maybe even medium-end, but even If I have to position it on my shoulder ( as I have a couple of times) it really increases my iPad enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good basic speaker enhancement.
customer_reviews.text: A good product for people that need just a bit more sound coming from there tablet, phone, or small device. No frequency balancing, but has a good sound. Not really much bass output, but you will pay a lot of money to get bass from a small speaker as this. Very nice mounting clip to keep the speaker attached to your tablet. Maybe seems a little large for its output, but it may be capable of much more if i researched sound amplifiers and equalizers a little more. I may do that and write another review once ive tested the limits of this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Tablet speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good speaker. Better quality sound than just the iPad itself, and it's very portable. It's a good solution for when I'm on the go. If you want quality sound... well, you get what you pay for. I'm happy with it. I will probably get something much higher quality for listening at home, but that's something I can't afford right now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. She has been using it almost constantly since then. She's using it about 3 hours a day, give or take, and has only had to charge it once a week. And being able to charge it using USB has made it very convenient. I recommend this product for anyone that wants a small footprint speaker system that sounds much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tomasello

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty powerful considering it is somewhat small. It has a clip that I find difficult to use because of my Ipad case but it does clip. I love the portability of it and will be taking it on vacation. There is no volume control on the speaker itself, only the Ipad volume can be adjusted which works fine, just wish I could crank it up a little higher. It will be good for poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Since I use my IPad for a tv set in my bedroom, I wanted a better speaker than what the iPad offers. This clip on more than fits the bill. I read others reviews before I purchased this speaker and the consensus was right , the sound is quite good. The only downside is the weight of the speaker clipped to the top of my iPad topples it backwards without additional support propped behind it.
customer_reviews.author: LISA N

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I teach a Line Dancing class. The music I use is on my tablet computer. Its speakers aren't loud enough for the class. This Logitech speaker is just what I needed. It's small and portable and offers all the amplification I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jane R

customer_reviews.title: More Volume, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses our iPad to access music to help here in her Chorale. When all is quiet, the iPad speaker is ok; but any background noise, like in the car, makes it hard. Looking for an external speaker similar to the Logitech one I have my laptop. This item works great. I would like it not have to be charged separately but we don't use it long enough to run it down. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Brisson

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Use for my iPad mini, hard to keep clipped on but great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mark 2 Eyeball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. In fact I have ONLY Logitech speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for her iPad. Excellent quality. In fact I have ONLY Logitech speakers due to their outstanding clarity. No volume control so you are at the mercy of the video volume setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lazer

customer_reviews.title: Don't raise the volume all the way on your device or your speaker may get damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great until I tested how loud it was. The sound got distorted, and it doesn't sound as good any more.
customer_reviews.author: Dperez

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the price keeps going up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker and used on my iPad until it got stolen. Reasonable good sound--certainly better than the built-in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech speaker
customer_reviews.text: This product was shopped in decent time, packed very well, very pleased with that. The speaker works very well, it works great. The only thing I'm not happy with is when you clip it to the iPad it slips off. Also if you have a back for the iPad or even a magnetic cover you have to take them off to have the speaker attach correctly. Other than those little problems I really enjoy the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kitycat24

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy set up!  Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Is very easy to use and has a very long battery life. The only thing that I would think could be improved was the volume. I am using this on my iPad and wish I could turn up the volume a little. There isn't a volume control on this device. I still would recommend it for an iPad user.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I like to watch movies on my iPad but eventually every earphone starts to hurt my ears. Without earphones the iPad speakers are terrible. So I decided to try this for $20 and it is fantastic. The device clips on my iPad WITH the case on it and the sound is amazing at any price. Light, easy to use, portable and saves my ears. Game of Thrones is blasting at me. This was also highly recommended on CNet and I think it is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product on a lark since I have a fairly profound loss of hearing and could barely hear anything coming out of the built-in "squeaker" on my iPAD. Boy, was I pleasantly surprised! I can now hear everything from my iPAD over this speaker at less than full volume. AND, I get stereo when appropriate. It is small, light weight and travels extremely well. Sounds plenty good to me, but with my diminished sense of hearing, I hardly qualify as an audio expert. I am very pleased with this speaker and highly recommend it. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: John Deats

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sound
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. I woke up the next morning with music playing, as usual, and assumed it was from our record player and tv. Not so. This little speaker was pumping out tv quality sound for $20! Awesome little thing. My husband was impressed because it works with his otter box case, and doesn't require batteries. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: adera17

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Custom fit soundbar for your iPad. Clips on or lays loose. Clip it on and put your iPad in an Anker multi-position stand and you have a jukebox with a screen that adjusts to any angle necessary for you to view your music. Works great with any 3.5 mm jack however the cord is designed to pretty close tolerances of the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: William Crisswell

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Definitely louder than the iPad speakers, nice boom, but don't expect a subwoofer. The stereo sound make a huge difference compared to the built in speaker of my iPad3 and iPhone5. Battery lasts long enough, but be careful not to forget the gadget power on, as it will drain fast. Relatively fast recharge time with supplied USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: .edu

customer_reviews.title: Wins on price and quality
customer_reviews.text: This has seen 2 months of heavy play on our kindle fire, iPads and android phones. You cannot beat this for the price. Battery is a little tepid and I anticipate actual useful life of under 18 months.. It also doesn't time out when left on and unplugged. This my 'Tweens favorite dysfunction when using the speaker. To be fair, this was not and advertised feature, but still, a definite liability. All in all, it wins on price and design. Cheap answer. We especially like using it to blast the Braves game on the back deck while we play catch. Good times!
customer_reviews.author: LaRue J. Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: The best add-on for audio support on tablets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my father to add to his iPad. The volume control on this unit allows my father to enjoy all the Skype and Facetime sessions he has with family. I recommend this unit for any person who may experience hearing difficulties. This may also help laptops or other tablets which have small speakers.
customer_reviews.author: RMWizer

customer_reviews.title: I like that, and it does boost the sound as ...
customer_reviews.text: not as loud as the product from Inateck, Yet this one actually attaches to the Ipad with clips. I like that, and it does boost the sound as advertised so I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: John sims

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but no volume control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my ipad hoping to get better amplification of some weak ipad podcasts. This boosted the volume somewhat and served its purpose. I give it only three stars because I think it should have been able to amplify the sound to a higher level on some weak signals. I also think there should have been an easily accessible volume control. The volume control on the ipad is not that easy to be constantly adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel W. Harris

customer_reviews.title: small and adequate boombox speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weighted and easy to carry (comes with a pouch). Also, it offers as a stand for one's ipad. The sound doesn't go up more than ipad's maximum volume and its sound quality is almost same as from ipad itself. It is just a cute little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Kns Office Queen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick for my tablet while working out in my gym.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound. Heavier than I expected but it is made good and sturdy. Needs to be plugged in and charged instead of taking power of off my device. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker does what it says, and sure makes the sound better on my ipad, as everyone is always complaining that the sound is too quiet on it. The only complaint is that you have to remember to turn the speaker off of the rechargeable battery will die out. Love the standard mini usb charger.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Howe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item today. So happy for the fast shipping. This item shipped on January 18,2013 and the arrival date will supposed to be on January 23,but I got it today January 19, just 1 day shipping isn't it nice? I love fast shipping. About the item,it's awesome, the sound quality is great. I can really tell the difference. It's just all I need. I love to order stuffs from Amazon. I strongly recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: CAN YOU HEAR ME NOW ? YES, YES I CAN.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of crap! Makes the noise sound awful and fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap! Makes the noise sound awful and fuzzy. Quit working after 2 days. I thought maybe it just needed new batteries, but There are no batteries to replace! Biggest piece of crap ever! I highly recommend NOT purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Webber

customer_reviews.title: If only it had lasted more than 4 days
customer_reviews.text: It sounded great for 4 days then the left side speaker stopped working, no it was not dropped or poorly handled. The four days that it worked I was very pleased, maybe I am just a small percentage here, so don't let this discourage you, because it was great when it did work with excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to put it mildly
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this speaker is just fine for the price point. The problem to me is that it is difficult and cumberson to attach to your ipad. Aso, the cord is really short so you can't really use it without it being attached. I'm going to try a wireless speaker for less than 15 dollars more. I hope I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is the same length as my apple I pad.i like the sound and the volume is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: j.duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: one of the worst speakers I've ever used! barely louder then the original ipad
customer_reviews.author: rick v.

customer_reviews.title: Great value -- great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker bar to plug into my iPad. I use the iPad extensively when teaching English to non-English speakers. The Logitech speaker allows the whole class to hear pronunciations. Plus, it's just plain old fun to kick up the volume a little while watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hook on my iPad Cover
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'll use this product. It doesn't hook over my padded Ipad cover so I have to remove the iPad first which defeats the benefit of having a cover in the first place. It doesn't increase the sound volume or the sound quality of my iPad II much. Great idea poorly implemented.
customer_reviews.author: NWPILOT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Affordable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, who loves it. It sounds really good for such a compact speaker. He also loves the portability it offers as he's used it to listen to tunes from a Windows laptop, an iPad, and an iPod Touch. Count me in as a fan of this Logictech speaker, also. I'm thinking about getting one now as well.
customer_reviews.author: slepster

customer_reviews.title: Killed itself
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the user-friendly aspect of this little speaker until it blew itself up. I was listening to a ball game when I heard a loud electrical "bzzzzt" sound, and the speaker never worked again. It won't turn back on at all. In my case, money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ranney

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a month (a birthday gift to a friend)
customer_reviews.text: I send this to a friend in Texas for her birthday , I found out that after a month the speaker stop working, I shop around read the reviews and I order this speakers, my friend was embarrassed to tell me about the problem. I wish someone from the company will contact me about this issue thank you
customer_reviews.author: consuelo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to listen to an audio book on the ipad in the car and the volume was not loud enough. With this speaker it is plenty loud for everyone in the car to hear. Wish it took batteries instead of having to be plugged into an outlet. It does last about 8 hrs though.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Better than tablet speakers
customer_reviews.text: This speaker unit is definitely better than the tablet factory speakers but that is about it. If you clip the speakers on to the tablet, the sound travels away from you. I plug the speakers in and have the unit in front of the tablet so i can hear. I recomment getting some generic small speakers and save the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Actually use it with my cell phone and a Kindle Fire and the sound is really pretty good. If you sit the speakers on a hard surface like a table top, it improves the sound since you get a bit of reflection. If you place it on a soft surface, or, hang it on the KINDLE (or I suppose the iPad) the sound is not quit as good.
customer_reviews.author: bossmbz

customer_reviews.title: Decent speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed something portable for my ipad and these were perfect. They hold a charge for a very long time and the speakers double as a stand for when I'm cooking or want to set my ipad somewhere. The sound quality is not out of this world but good considering how small the speakers are.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

product_meta.title: Logitech Tablet Speaker for iPad/Tablet
product_meta.description:
Clip on, plug in, press play. A rubberized clip securely attaches the speaker to your iPad or other tablet. The 3.5 mm audio cable plugs into the headphone jack. And just like that, you’ve got sound that’s worth sharing.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



FEATURES







*Actual battery life will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions. Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles.





COMPATIBILITY




COMPARE


Which Logitech iPad Accessory Is Right For You?
feature_bullets: Clip-on stereo speaker for iPad: Full stereo sound amplifies your iPad listening experience anywhere you go
Rubberized clip: Speaker attaches easily and securely to your iPad or other tablet
Quick connection: Simply plug the 3.5 mm cable into your tablet's headphone jack and start listening
Easy USB charging for mobile music marathons (Actual battery life will vary with use,settings and environmental conditions.
Compact travel size: Fits easily inside the included travel case or your laptop bag
Eight-hour rechargeable battery: Easy USB charging for mobile music marathons
Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles.)
Actual battery life will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions.
